content.rendered:
Directed by Rambhala

Written by Rambhala

Cast Santhanam (Viji). Shritha Sivadas (Maya). Motta Rajendran (Viji’s Sidekick (as Rajendran)). Bipin (Viji’s Father (Tantrik)). Urvashi (Tantrik). Shivashankar (Viji’s Neighbourhood). G. Marimuthu (Politician). T.M. Karthik Srinivasan (Doctor Karthik (as T.M. Karthik)). Ramar (Viji’s Neighbourhood). K. Bujji Babu (Viji’s neighbour) . Bipin (Garudaraja Bhattadhri). Lollu Sabha Maaran (‘Mike’ Maaran)

Languages Tamil

Producers Santhanam

Production Handmade film
